snippet: Mr. Woods conceived of a radical environment, one intended for a world in conflict, in an era when many of his peers focused on corporate headquarters and high-rises.
abstract: Lebbeus Woods, architect whose works were rarely built but who influenced colleagues and students with defiantly imaginative drawings and installations challenging convention and commercialism, dies at age 72.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Woods conceived of a radical environment, one intended for a world in conflict, in an era when many of his peers focused on corporate headquarters and high-rises.

headline.seo: Lebbeus Woods, Unconventional Architect, Dies at 72
headline.main: Lebbeus Woods, Architect Who Bucked Convention, Dies at 72

keywords.value: Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art
keywords.name: organizations
